thread.title: Top choice!
thread.title_full: Top choice! - Review of Park Central Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Nat2016
title: Top choice!
text: As four women exploring New York City for a week,the location of this hotel was simply perfect. Walking distance to Central Park, Times Square, restuarants, tourist spots and shops, shops, shops!! Rooms were very comfortable and serviced daily. An elevator to our room at the end of the day, was a welcome relief! Highly recommended!
